column4: Hi, everyone. I installed Ubuntu 10.04 LTS yesterday. In Ubuntu 9.10, when I grabbed a window and moved it to the side of the screen the view automatically switched to the next workspace. This is no longer the case here. How do I turn this feature on?
enable ccsm and activate the plugin that does that.
you do have the proper 3d drivers for your card?
all other desktop effects work fine, I think the driver is ok.
